title: House Industries
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : House Industries**

House Industries is run by [Rich Roat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rich%20Roat) and [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz) with designer [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) as Typography Director.

For the full, colorful history, read [the House Ten Year Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=143). To keep up with recent developments, read [Show & Tell](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/typophile.com/wiki/showandtell), the House blog.

URL: [www.houseind.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230838/http:/www.houseind.com/)

**Additional Articles**

author: Hannes Famira
